ValidationRule.description: It checks if user has provided a reason upon deactivation of an account
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(NS_Deactivate__c = true && ISBLANK( NS_DeactivationReason__c ),NS_Deactivate__c = false && NOT( ISBLANK( NS_DeactivationReason__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter the Deactivation Reason AND check the Deactivate checkbox to request that this Account be deactivated.
